GSD.description:
sched/debug: fix dentry leak in update_sched_domain_debugfs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.9 by commit 0c32a93963e03c03e561d5a066eedad211880ba3. For more details please see the references link.
